channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for KY
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for KY

item.title: Report X-2025010847
item.description:
Report X-2025010847

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-23T21:13:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-17
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY, ONE AIR PACKAGE WAS FOUND COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING LOBSTER TAILS WAS FOUND. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM ARIZONA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER AK1138, ANGIE'S LOBSTER, 150 MAIN ST, RICHMOND ME 04357-1152.
